25.ara-name: كتاب الأطعمة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Sharik bin Hanbal:That 'Ali said: "Eating garlic is no good, except when cooked." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This chain of this Hadith is not strong. It has been reported as a saying of 'Ali and it has been reported from Sharik bin Hanbal from the Prophet (ﷺ) in Mursal form. Muhammad said: "Al-Jarrah bin Malih (one of the narratos) is truthful, and Al-Jarrah bin Ad-Dahhak is Muqarib (average) in Hadith

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرُّخْصَةِ فِي الثُّومِ مَطْبُوخًا
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Permission To Eat Cooked Garlic
